choice.rationale: This table clearly presents Net Revenue by Segment for the latest fiscal years 2025 and 2024, with segment names Semiconductor solutions and Infrastructure software, and a total net revenue line. It includes year headers and units in millions, consistent with Item 8 financial statements and notes context.

layout.notes: Row labels in first column; fiscal year columns at indices 6 and 12 corresponding to 2025 and 2024; units in millions

validation.notes: No total revenue reference available; validated by internal sum only.
